verses.text: \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w was|strong="G0321"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* led \w up|strong="G0321"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* to be \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w fasted|strong="G3522"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w nights|strong="G3571"\w*, he \w was|strong="G3983"\w* \w afterward|strong="G5305"\w* an \w hungred|strong="G3983"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when the \w tempter|strong="G3985"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w command|strong="G2036"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w It is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w Man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w live|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w word|strong="G4487"\+w* \+w that proceedeth|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w of the mouth|strong="G4750"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w taketh|strong="G3880"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G3880"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w setteth|strong="G2476"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* a \w pinnacle|strong="G4419"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, He shall \w give|strong="G1781"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w charge|strong="G1781"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* they shall \w bear|strong="G0142"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w*, lest at any \w time|strong="G3379"\w* thou \w dash|strong="G4350"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w foot|strong="G4228"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w It is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w again|strong="G3825"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt|strong="G1598"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tempt|strong="G1598"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w*, the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w taketh|strong="G3880"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G3880"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* an \w exceeding|strong="G3029"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sheweth|strong="G1166"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w kingdoms|strong="G0932"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w All|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* will I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou wilt fall \w down|strong="G4098"\w* and \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Get thee hence|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3441"\+w* \+w shalt thou serve|strong="G3000"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w leaveth|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* was cast into \w prison|strong="G3860"\w*, he \w departed|strong="G0402"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w leaving|strong="G2641"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is upon the sea \w coast|strong="G3864"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w borders|strong="G3725"\w* of \w Zabulon|strong="G2194"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nephthalim|strong="G3508"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

The \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Zabulon|strong="G2194"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Nephthalim|strong="G3508"\w*, \add by\add* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*;

The \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w region|strong="G5561"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* is sprung \w up|strong="G0393"\w*.

¶ \w From|strong="G0575"\w* that \w time|strong="G5119"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Repent|strong="G3340"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w is at hand|strong="G1448"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w casting|strong="G0906"\w* a \w net|strong="G0293"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w fishers|strong="G0231"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Follow|strong="G1205"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I will make|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w fishers|strong="G0231"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0863"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \add their\add* \w nets|strong="G1350"\w*, and \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* going \w on|strong="G4260"\w* from \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \add the son\add* of \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w mending|strong="G2675"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w nets|strong="G1350"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, and \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w about|strong="G4013"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2784"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healing|strong="G2323"\w* all manner \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w sickness|strong="G3554"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all manner \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w disease|strong="G3119"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w fame|strong="G0189"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* sick \w people|strong="G2560"\w* that were \w taken|strong="G4912"\w* with \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w diseases|strong="G3554"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w torments|strong="G0931"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* those which were possessed with \w devils|strong="G1139"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* those which were \w lunatick|strong="G4583"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* those that had the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* great \w multitudes|strong="G4183"\w* of \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w Decapolis|strong="G1179"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*.
